text: Mandarin reading article at a HSK 1 level. Learn important sentence structures for Chinese beginners.今天我很高兴，因为我的好朋友送给我一个礼物。当我回家的时候我会打开这个礼物。我很想知道里面有什么！我的朋友为什么给我一个礼物呢？因为今天是我的生日！I am very happy today because my good friend gave me a present.I will open this gift when I go home.I really want to know what is inside!Why did my friend give me a present? Because today is my birthday!1 – 今天她感觉怎么样？a. 生气b. 高兴c. 尴尬d. 不高兴2 – 她什么时候会打开礼物？a. 两分钟之后b. 马上c. 回家的时候d. 她不会打开礼物1. b2. cReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
